Author: _t1nk_
Text: Yes I refer to my sugar addiction as the sugar monster.  It takes me FOREVER to cut back and stop eating sugar to the point that the cravings are still there but easier to avoid/ignore. But if I do cave and eat something sweet or with sugar then the cravings come back ten-fold and it usually spirals me into a binge phase.  &#x200B;  Sorry about the stressful situation. I know you want more but fight it. Have some fruit maybe though that often makes it worse for me so I suggest just keep fighting it. Find some distractions. You are worth it <3
